text: I always liked this game's calming take on the original theme (Out of Phase), it evokes nostalgia. While the first game remains my favorite, I really enjoyed PE2 as well. Square Enix, let's forget 3rd Birthday ever existed and give us the sequel we have been waiting for, on a home console. We need more Horror RPGs.
author: SupraDarky

text: Third birthday wasn't even bad.  It just wasn't a parasite eve game.  It had all the makings of a horror game and it did that fine.  Music was okay too.  Maeda was a mess in it, the time travel was a different idea to the genre.  OwO:  Thanks for the upload. :D
author: Kat Clairmont

text:
Kat Clairmont 
Definitely agree, mechanically as just a third person shooter, I’d argue it’s one of the best on the PSP, just would do better not being attached to the PE universe.
